entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 10:54 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.5°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
